Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-32463 affecting package sudo for versions less than 1.9.17-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-32463 affecting package sudo for versions less than 1.9.17-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sudo is earlier than 1.9.17-1, affected by CVE-2025-32463
